function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inflow of rural population into urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases transmission due to population density and inadequate infrastructure","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare facilities and infrastructure in urban areas, implementing public health awareness programs","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, public health surveillance systems","People":"Rural population, urban population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Accelerated industrialization and urban population increase","Impact":"Overcrowding and strain on healthcare services leading to higher disease transmission rates","Mitigation":"Economic diversification, investment in healthcare infrastructure and services","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, urban planning tools","People":"Urban population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, private investors"},{"Description":"Grounding housing fund construction on socialist principles","Impact":"Potential inadequacy in housing infrastructure to support public health needs","Mitigation":"Implementing modern housing standards, upgrading existing housing infrastructure","Technologies":"Smart building technology, urban planning software","People":"Residential population, public health authorities","Owner":"Government, construction companies"}]}
